text: althna' ealaa allah bsfath alty klluha awsaf kmal, wbnemh alzzahirat walbatnt, aldiyniat waldnywyt, khaliq alsamawat wal'ard wmbdehma, jaeil almalayikat rusulana 'iilaa man yasha' min ebadh, wfyma sha' min 'amrih wnhyh, wmin eazim qudrat allah 'an jaeal almalayikat 'ashab 'ajnihat mthna wathulath warubae tatir bha; ltblygh ma 'amar allah bh, yazid allah fi khalaqah ma ysha'. 'iina allah ealaa kl shay' qdyr, la ystesy ealayh shy'
